desc: [OFFICIAL SITE] Because big dogs need more than just a normal dog bed. 10 year warranty. Made in USA. For big dogs only, from Labs up to Great Danes. Free shipping, 365 day trial period.

layout.text: For big dogs, this is not just a better sleep. It's a better life.

The only dog bed clinically proven to improve quality of life for big dogs. Better rest, less pain, more mobility. Uniquely engineered to keep dogs youthful for longer and bring older dogs back to their best.
